TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInputElement

summary.span: 为 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素进行的基本输入处理建立公共事件，以及事件相关属性和方法。

span.span: Establishes the common events and also the event-related properties and methods for basic input processing by Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 尽管此接口是公共的但它不被应在应用程序或框架构建的方案实现。Although this interface is public, it is not intended to be implemented in application or framework-building scenarios. 此接口是公共的用于连接的继承要求由于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]到核心[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]framework。This interface is public because of the inheritance requirements for connecting the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] core to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework. 你还可以用作此接口的强制转换机制来强制执行的输入的事件和属性将出现从或，这可以在相同的输入模型中处理。You can also use this interface as a casting mechanism to enforce that the input events and properties will come from either a or , which can be handled in the same input model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF 体系结构](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md)并还会看到[基元素概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information, see [WPF Architecture](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md) and also see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddHandler (System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, Delegate handler);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddHandler(class System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, class System.Delegate handler) cil managed
public: void AddHandler(System::Windows::RoutedEvent ^ routedEvent, Delegate ^ handler);

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 要处理的路由事件的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the routed event that is being handled.

param.name: handler
param.span: 对处理程序实现的引用。

span.span: A reference to the handler implementation.

summary.span: 将特定的路由事件的路由事件处理程序添加到元素。

span.span: Adds a routed event handler for a specific routed event to an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CaptureMouse() cil managed

summary.span: 尝试将鼠标强制捕获到此元素。

span.span: Attempts to force capture of the mouse to this element.

returns.span: 如果成功捕获了鼠标，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the mouse is successfully captured; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CaptureStylus() cil managed

summary.span: 尝试将触笔强制捕获到此元素。

span.span: Attempts to force capture of the stylus to this element.

returns.span: 如果成功捕获了触笔，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the stylus is successfully captured; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Focus() cil managed

summary.span: 尝试使键盘焦点位于此元素上。

span.span: Attempts to focus the keyboard on this element.

returns.span: 如果键盘焦点移动到此元素，或者已经在此元素上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if keyboard focus is moved to this element or already was on this element; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Focusable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可将焦点设置到此元素。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus can be set to this element.

value.span: 如果可将焦点设置到此元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element can have focus set to it; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 中的现有实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (请参阅和) 将此属性设置为依赖项属性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) establish this property as a dependency property.

summary.span: 在此元素聚焦于键盘时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 在元素捕获鼠标时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the element captures the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 当在元素捕获鼠标时，该元素将接收鼠标输入，即使光标位于超出界限。When an element captures the mouse, that element receives mouse input even if the cursor is outside its bounds. 鼠标仅在拖放操作过程通常在这种方式中捕获和捕获之前发生拖放操作的状态将保持。The mouse is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.

summary.span: 在元素捕获触笔时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the element captures the stylus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 当元素捕获触笔时，该元素将接收触笔输入，即使光标位于超出界限。When an element captures the stylus, that element receives stylus input even if the cursor is outside its bounds. 触笔仅在拖放操作过程通常在这种方式中捕获和捕获之前发生拖放操作的状态将保持。The stylus is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations, and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中启用了此元素。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this element is enabled in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].

value.span: 如果启用了该元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 中的现有实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (请参阅和) 进行读/写和将此属性构建依赖项属性为此属性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) make this property read/write and establish this property as a dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsKeyboardFocused As Boolean
public: property bool IsKeyboardFocused { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值表示此元素是否具有键盘焦点。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has keyboard focus.

value.span: 如果此元素具有键盘焦点，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this element has keyboard focus; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 中的现有实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (请参阅和) 将此属性设置为依赖项属性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) establish this property as a dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsKeyboardFocusWithin As Boolean
public: property bool IsKeyboardFocusWithin { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示键盘焦点是否处于元素边界内的任何位置（包括键盘焦点是否位于任何可视子元素的边界内）。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether keyboard focus is anywhere inside the element bounds, including if keyboard focus is inside the bounds of any visual child elements.

value.span: 如果键盘焦点在元素或其子元素上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if keyboard focus is on the element or its child elements; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 中的现有实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (请参阅和) 将此属性设置为依赖项属性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) establish this property as a dependency property.

public: property bool IsMouseCaptured { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否将鼠标捕获到此元素。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the mouse is captured to this element.

value.span: 如果元素具有鼠标捕获，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element has mouse capture; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsMouseDirectlyOver As Boolean
public: property bool IsMouseDirectlyOver { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在最严格的命中测试意义上鼠标指针是否位于此元素上。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the mouse pointer is over this element in the strictest hit testing sense.

value.span: 如果鼠标指针位于此元素上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the mouse pointer is over this element; otherwise, .

public: property bool IsMouseOver { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示鼠标指针是否位于此元素（包括其边界内的可视子元素）上方。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the mouse pointer is located over this element (including visual children elements that are inside its bounds).

value.span: 如果鼠标指针位于此元素或其子元素上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the mouse pointer is over the element or its child elements; otherwise, .

value.span: 如果触笔位于此元素上，则为 ；否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsStylusOver As Boolean
public: property bool IsStylusOver { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示触笔是否位于此元素（或其边界内的可视子元素）上方。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is located over this element (or over visual child elements that are inside its bounds).

value.span: 如果触笔光标位于此元素或其子元素上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the stylus cursor is over the element or its child elements; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 某些核心的类，该实现，如，还实现跟踪对此属性更改事件。Some core classes that implement , such as , also implement an event that tracks changes to this property. 但是，此接口不包括此类事件作为其协定的一部分。However, this interface does not include such an event as part of its contract. 中的现有实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (请参阅和) 将此属性设置为依赖项属性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) establish this property as a dependency property.

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while the keyboard is focused on this element.

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is no longer focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 在此元素丢失鼠标捕获时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，即使光标位于其边界之外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the cursor is outside its borders. 通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获了鼠标。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.

summary.span: 在此元素丢失触笔捕获时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element loses stylus capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 当元素捕获触笔时，它会接收触笔输入，即使光标位于其边界之外。When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the cursor is outside its borders. 通常，将触笔捕获仅在拖放操作过程。The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.

summary.span: 在鼠标指针进入此元素的边界时发生。

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于元素上并且按下鼠标右键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于元素上并且松开鼠标右键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 当鼠标指针位于此元素上并且鼠标滚轮移动时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 当触笔位于此元素上并按下触笔按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus button is pressed down while the stylus is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 当触笔位于此元素上并释放触笔按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus button is released while the stylus is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 在触笔位于元素上且同时触及数字化器时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus touches the digitizer while over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 在触笔移到元素上却未触及数字化器时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus moves over an element, but without touching the digitizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 在触笔与数字化仪之间的距离近到足以检测到触笔时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus is close enough to the digitizer to be detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 在触笔位于元素上并且移动触笔时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus moves while the stylus is over the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

span.span: Occurs when the stylus is too far from the digitizer to be detected.

span.span: Occurs when the stylus is raised off the digitizer while over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaiseEvent(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 包含要引发事件标识符的 类的实例。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the identifier for the event to raise.

summary.span: 引发路由事件，该事件由所提供的 内的 属性指定。

span.span: Raises the routed event that is specified by the property within the provided .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReleaseMouseCapture() cil managed

summary.span: 如果此元素具有鼠标捕获，则释放该捕获。

span.span: Releases the mouse capture, if this element holds the capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReleaseStylusCapture() cil managed

summary.span: 如果此元素具有触笔捕获，则释放该捕获。

span.span: Releases the stylus capture, if this element holds the capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口不适合公共实现。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注以接口。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemoveHandler (System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, Delegate handler);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveHandler(class System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, class System.Delegate handler) cil managed

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 附加处理程序的路由事件的标识符。

span.span: Identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.

param.name: handler
param.span: 要从此元素的事件处理程序集合中删除的特定处理程序实现。

span.span: The specific handler implementation to remove from this element's event handler collection.

summary.span: 从此元素中删除指定路由事件处理程序的所有实例。

span.span: Removes all instances of the specified routed event handler from this element.
